diff_hunk:
@@ -153,6 +153,14 @@ def _testSpecialCasesVariable(self):
       self.assertAllEqual(result[0], inp[0:1, :])
       self.assertAllEqual(result[1], inp[1:4, :])
 
+      result = self.evaluate(array_ops.split(inp, [-1, 4], 0))
body:
It would be a little better to move these additional assertions into another test method, so that
1. each test method will not end up testing too much 
2. each test method will have an informative name that tells what the test is specifically about
3. in case some earlier assertions fail, others will still get a chance to run.

each test method will not end up testing too much
each test method will have an informative name that tells what the test is specifically about
in case some earlier assertions fail, others will still get a chance to run.
